---
title: PLOTTING_FLOW
---

PLOTTING_FLOW generates visualization outputs: Manhattan plots, QQ, LocusZoom-style regional plots and QC figures.

Key responsibilities

- Create global GWAS QC plots and per-locus visualisations.

Important parameters

- `run_plot` and plotting-related resource knobs.

Outputs

- Plots in `GWAS_Plots` and `Loci` result folders.
